name: I'm Everyone
tag_list: anonymous, realtime, social, problem, confessions, discussion, forum
overview:
I’m Everyone is a realtime problem, confession and discussion site.

The site differs from older confession sites (GroupHug or PostSecret) in the following ways:

  • A magazine-style layout. Each post has typography, images, and video attached.
  • Posts are pushed to the top of the site via interaction (views, comments, and likes).
  • The site runs in realtime - new content is pushed to all users in the ‘Live’ area immediately
  • Conversations between strangers. Each participant is assigned a unique, temporary avatar to allow people to identify the poster and commenters in different replies.
  • Extensive curation

Socially, the site appeals to a wider, more mature and more female audience than most of the sites competitors, with around a 70/30 women/men split and most posters in the 25-35 group.

milestones.source_description: I'm Everyone, a live, anonymous image/video site
